discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: @affeldt-aist looks like fourcolour needs an overlay

discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: Hello. Shouldn't we use the deprecation facility rather than having overlays? https://github.com/math-comp/math-comp/blob/5d7bd2ea2a0a28fb275da8ba2e2c0dc5a33d1034/mathcomp/ssreflect/ssreflect.v#L15-L28

discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment:
> Hello. Shouldn't we use the deprecation facility rather than having overlays? 

Indeed. Will do.

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
Proof. by elim: n => // n IHn; rewrite -[in LHS]addn1 nseqD rev_cat IHn. Qed.
```

commits.author: affeldt-aist
commits.message:
- switching long suffixes to short suffixes
  + `odd_add` -> `oddD`
  + `odd_sub` -> `oddB`
  + `take_addn` -> `takeD`
  + `rot_addn` -> `rotD`
  + `nseq_addn` -> `nseqD`

fixes #359
